article_title: Doctors Risk Being Government Employees Under ACA

Carson, thought to be considering a 2016 presidential run wants to bring back free enterprise and competition that drives innovation.

og.description: One of the reasons the private medical practice is disappearing is that the costs of the new Obamacare rules are so onerous, Dr. Ben Carson said Tuesday on Fox News Channel's "On the Record with Greta Van Susteren."
